string.text: Respond to the call for Help
Offer to help the Neutral Leader
Talk to the Commander in charge of the Outpost

Everybody!!! .. Come to the Duty Outpost at the Dump. there is a herd of Wild Boars coming in from the direction of the Dark Valley ... and moving fast!!! All who will help us fend off, and destroy these vermin, we will reward in kind .... so, please!!! Help us ... NOW!!!
Help the Duty faction eliminate the Boars
Find out what Serly knows about Strelok

Bes: Those Bandit bastards are trying once again to take control over the Dump. About a half-hour ago they attacked us. We managed to kill three of those freaks. Some of my men have gone to get reinforcements. There are not enough of us left, and we could really use some help. If you fight alongside us, Brother ... I will be sure to make it worth your while ...
At the Machinery Graveyard, there was a terrible fight between the Neutrals and the Bandits. There is soon to be another attack, and the Neutrals need all the help they can get ...
